summary: MAKE: AUDI   MODEL: QUATTRO   YEAR: 2002   COMPLAINT NUMBER: 768611   SUMMARY:   AUDI HAS ACKNOWLEDGED THE FACT IN A REPORT TO USA TODAY THAT THE ALLROAD MODEL HAS WHAT IS CALLED DELAYED THROTTLE RESPONSE A POTENTIALLY LIFE THREATENING MALFUNCTION OF THE TIPTRONIC TRANSMISSION BUT AUDI OF AMERICA DENIES THE PROBLEM EXSISTS TO THE OWNERS OF THESE VEHICLES WHEN WE CONTACT THEM OR THEIR DEALER NETWORK. THIS PROBLEM IS AS DANGEROUS AS AUDI'S UNINTENDED ACCELERATION ISSUE YEARS BACK. SEVERAL HUNDRED AUDI OWNERS HAVE SIGNED A PETITION REGARDING THIS VITAL SAFETY CONCERN. PLEASE HELP US. THANK YOU. DT
